title: Fix 7 failing tests caused by Technician MOM 55→58
description: COMPLETED Round 2: QA fixed 18 test failures across 4 files (7 from Technician MOM + 11 from Charger INIT/STA). Rewrote match.test.ts worked example (now 2-pass unseat). Added 16 new tests. 605/605 passing.

title: Fix Technician weakness at Epic/Giga tiers
description: COMPLETED Round 1: Technician MOM 55→58. Win rates improved: bare +3.1pp (48.7%), epic +0.9pp (46.4%), giga +2.1pp (48.3%). All above 45% target.

title: Investigate Charger weakness at bare tier
description: COMPLETED Round 2: Charger INIT 60→55, STA 60→65. Bare win rate 35.9%→41-42% (+5-6pp). Target ≥40% met. Spread tightened from 26.5pp to ~19pp.

title: Assess breakerGuardPenetration effectiveness
description: COMPLETED Round 3: breakerGuardPenetration 0.20→0.25. Breaker overall +2-3pp across most tiers (bare 48.2%, epic 52.2%, giga 54.8%). No test failures — constant is NOT test-locked. Full analysis in balance-tuner-round-3.md.

title: Test gear variant interactions with archetype matchups
description: COMPLETED Round 1: QA added 112 new tests (44→156 in gear-variants.test.ts). All variant tests pass.

title: Test softCap boundary behavior
description: COMPLETED Round 2: QA added 6 softCap boundary tests + 10 exploratory edge cases to calculator.test.ts. All passing.

title: Test stamina/fatigue boundary conditions
description: COMPLETED Round 3: QA added 10 fatigue boundary tests. 647/647 passing.

title: Polish rarity card styling
description: COMPLETED Round 1: Added per-tier colored hover glow, selected state glow, prefers-reduced-motion support.

title: Improve variant toggle button UX
description: COMPLETED Rounds 1-2: Stance-colored active states, pill group container, hover preview, mobile touch targets.

title: Review balance-config.ts for magic numbers
description: COMPLETED Round 1: All balance-tunable constants centralized. See analysis/review-round-1.md.

title: Type safety audit of gear system
description: COMPLETED Round 2: Full audit — no 'any', no 'as' casts, exhaustive slot mappings. See analysis/reviewer-round-2.md.

title: Full tier sweep — run sims at all 7 tiers and document
description: COMPLETED Round 3: Full 7-tier sweep documented in balance-tuner-round-3.md. Balance improves monotonically with tier (18.5pp bare → 4.1pp giga).

title: Test breaker guard penetration mechanic
description: COMPLETED Round 3: QA added 4 penetration tests. 647/647 passing.

title: Polish combat result display
description: COMPLETED Round 2: Added badge-appear animation, crit-glow pulse, unseat-entrance animation.

title: Review round 1 code changes for quality
description: COMPLETED Round 2: Reviewed balance-tuner's Technician MOM change, QA's 112 new tests, polish's CSS. APPROVED.

title: Remove inline styles from LoadoutScreen variant toggle
description: COMPLETED Round 3: Polish agent removed VARIANT_COLORS constant and inline style={...}. CSS stance tokens now fully control colors.

title: Review round 2 code changes for quality
description: COMPLETED Round 3: Reviewed Charger INIT/STA swap, QA's 18 test fixes + 16 new tests, match worked example rewrite. APPROVED.

title: Polish melee transition and winner banner
description: COMPLETED Round 3: Melee transition entrance, winner banner gold glow, draw entrance, btn--outline modifier.

title: Investigate Tactician mirror P1 bias (BUG-002)
description: COMPLETED Round 5: QA added 2 targeted tests — Tactician mirror N=500 (P1 40-60%) and all 6 archetype mirrors N=500 (P1 35-65%). BUG-002 CLOSED — confirmed Monte Carlo noise. 649/649 passing.

title: Fix Bulwark bare/uncommon dominance — test guardImpactCoeff 0.16
description: SUPERSEDED by BL-025. guardImpactCoeff 0.18→0.16 proven INEFFECTIVE (<1pp change, within noise). Balance-tuner pivoted to stat redistribution. See balance-tuner-round-5.md.

title: Prepare test updates for guardImpactCoeff 0.18→0.16
description: CANCELLED — guardImpactCoeff not being changed. QA completed the mapping (see qa-round-5.md) as reference documentation, but no test changes needed.

title: Update CLAUDE.md balance state + review Round 4 changes
description: COMPLETED Round 5: Reviewer updated CLAUDE.md — breakerGuardPenetration 0.25, Charger INIT/STA documented, test count 647, simulate.ts variant syntax. APPROVED WITH NOTES. See reviewer-round-5.md.

title: Add multi-pass worked example test to match.test.ts
description: COMPLETED Round 6: QA added 6-test multi-pass worked example (Tactician vs Duelist, 5 passes, full fatigue trace). match.test.ts now 77 tests. 655/655 passing.

title: Add gear item rarity-colored borders
description: COMPLETED Round 6: CSS rules for .gear-item--uncommon through .gear-item--giga added to App.css. Dormant until JSX adds gear-item--${rarity} class to .gear-item divs in LoadoutScreen.tsx. Needs ui-dev agent for JSX change.

title: Apply Bulwark stat redistribution: CTL 55→52, MOM 55→58
description: COMPLETED Round 6: Bulwark MOM 55→58, CTL 55→52 applied in archetypes.ts. Uncommon Bulwark 63.7%→58.5% (-5.2pp), spread 22.1pp→15.5pp. Rare/epic excellent. Zero test failures. Giga Bulwark test data updated (momentum 68→71, control 68→65). See balance-tuner-round-6.md.

title: Fix stale test comments + verify Bulwark change cascade
description: COMPLETED Round 6: Fixed phase-resolution.test.ts:424 stale comment (0.2→BALANCE reference). Updated calculator.test.ts:805 Giga Bulwark construct (momentum 68→71, control 68→65). Cascade verification: zero breakages from BL-025. 655/655 passing.

title: Review Round 6 changes + update CLAUDE.md with BL-025 results
description: COMPLETED Round 7: CLAUDE.md updated with Bulwark stats, test count to 655, per-archetype win rates. See reviewer-round-7.md.

title: Run N=1000 confirmation for Tactician uncommon and Breaker giga
description: COMPLETED Round 7: Balance-tuner ran 93,600-match health check across 13 simulation runs. QA independently ran 3-run validation. BUG-006 CLOSED: Tactician uncommon = 54.3% mean (noise). Breaker giga down to 53.9-55.3% across runs (stable, within tolerance). No action needed.

title: Apply Technician MOM 61→64 to fix persistent weakness
description: COMPLETED S33: Technician MOM changed from 61 to 64 in archetypes.ts. 6 test assertions updated. 794 tests passing.

title: Fix test assertions broken by Technician MOM 61→64
description: COMPLETED S33 Phase 2: All test assertions fixed after Technician MOM change. 794 tests passing (was 699 before AI test suite added).

title: Migrate top-priority inline styles to CSS classes
description: COMPLETED S33: 35 inline styles migrated to CSS classes across 5 components (commit dcd0dd0).

title: Improve combat result readability in PassResult
description: COMPLETED S33: Winner banner, impact advantage display, counter visibility improvements (commit 6d7676d).

title: Add rarity-colored borders to gear items in LoadoutScreen
description: COMPLETED S33: Rarity-colored gear borders activated from dormant CSS (commit b98a7e0).

title: Player experience audit — archetype identity and fun factor
description: COMPLETED S33: 485-line design analysis with fun tier list and 5 mechanic proposals (commit 264f327). Output: orchestrator/analysis/design-round-1.md.

title: Consolidate and clean up App.css color variables
description: COMPLETED S33: 40+ CSS custom properties created, colors consolidated (commit 9f43489).

title: Add responsive breakpoints for mobile layout
description: COMPLETED S33: Responsive breakpoints added (tablet ≤768px, mobile ≤480px) (commit a66c30f).

title: Analyze gear variant win rate impact per archetype
description: COMPLETED S33: 57,600 matches simulated, 375-line report. Variant system graded B-. Output: orchestrator/analysis/balance-tuner-variant-analysis.md (commit f5e97c2).

title: Add AI opponent test coverage
description: COMPLETED S33: 95 AI tests created in src/ai/ai.test.ts covering validity, reasoning, patterns, edge cases (commit bfd9f17).

title: Update CLAUDE.md test count to 822 and fix stale counts
description:
CLAUDE.md currently says 794 tests but actual count is 822 after S34 Round 1 (BL-050/051 added 28 tests). Update CLAUDE.md:
- Quick Reference: test count 794→822
- Test Suite section: update per-file breakdown:
  - phase-resolution.test.ts: 55 (was 38)
  - match.test.ts: 100 (was 89)
  - calculator.test.ts: 194
  - gigling-gear.test.ts: 48
  - player-gear.test.ts: 46

  - gear-variants.test.ts: 156

- Total: 822 (was 794)

Acceptance criteria: CLAUDE.md reflects 822 tests with correct per-file breakdown matching actual vitest output.

title: Post-Technician-change full tier sweep and validation
description:
Full simulation sweep across 7 tiers + variants to validate Technician MOM 58→64 change.

✅ COMPLETE: Technician validated at +7-8pp across all tiers (target was +2-3pp, exceeded by 3-4×):
- Bare: 53% (was ~46%)
- Uncommon: 46% (was ~38%)
- Rare/Epic/Giga: 50-52% range
- All validation criteria met: no new flags, Charger/Bulwark unaffected
- Comprehensive 350-line report in analysis/balance-tuner-round-1.md

title: Evaluate gear variant impact on player decisions
description:
Analyze whether the 3 gear variants (aggressive/balanced/defensive) create meaningful player choices:

1. Does variant choice feel impactful or like noise? Can a player FEEL the difference between all-aggressive and all-defensive loadouts?
2. Are there interesting variant combinations? (e.g., aggressive lance + defensive armor for a specific matchup strategy)
3. Is the UI clear enough for players to understand what each variant does?
4. Should variant choice interact with archetype selection? (e.g., aggressive gear on a Bulwark — is that a fun contrarian build or just suboptimal?)
5. Propose any improvements to make variant selection more engaging.

Read src/engine/gigling-gear.ts, src/engine/player-gear.ts, and the gear variant test data. Write analysis to orchestrator/analysis/design-round-2.md.

Acceptance criteria: Clear assessment of variant system with at least 1 concrete improvement proposal.

title: Migrate remaining inline styles to CSS classes
description:
7 components still use inline style={} props. Migrate them to CSS classes:

1. helpers.tsx lines 78,99,112,114 — StatBar width, DeltaVal color, StaminaBar fontWeight/width
2. MatchSummary.tsx lines 192,210 — timeline pip animationDelay (use CSS cascading or custom properties)
3. PassResult.tsx, SetupScreen.tsx, MeleeTransition.tsx, MeleeResult.tsx, AIThinkingPanel.tsx — scan for remaining style={} props

For dynamic values (% widths, animation delays), use CSS custom properties via style={{'--pct': pct}} + var(--pct) in CSS.

Acceptance criteria: Zero inline styles except dynamic CSS custom properties. All tests passing (794).

title: Add hover/focus states for interactive card elements
description:
Interactive cards (.card--selectable, .attack-card, .speed-card) need better hover/focus polish:

1. .attack-card, .speed-card: add :hover with subtle brightness/shadow enhancement
2. All selectable cards: add :focus-visible with 2px gold outline offset for keyboard nav
3. All selectable cards: add :active pressed effect (scale 0.98, slight shadow reduction)
4. Variant toggle buttons: enhance box-shadow on active state instead of just border
5. Ensure WCAG AA color contrast on all hover states

Acceptance criteria: All interactive elements have distinct hover, focus, and active states. Keyboard navigation is visually clear.

title: Polish animations, transitions, and visual hierarchy
description:
Improve visual polish in several areas:

1. Add cascading delays to multi-element entrance sequences (timeline pips, gear lists)
2. Summary table rows: add subtle :hover background highlight
3. Combat log entries: add visual separation (border-left accent per entry)
4. Increase line-height in dense text blocks (pass result breakdown, stat comparisons)
5. Reduce animation durations on mobile (@media max-width: 480px) for performance
6. Verify all animations respect prefers-reduced-motion

Acceptance criteria: Smoother animations, better readability in dense areas, mobile performance improved.

title: Add phase-resolution edge case tests
description:
The phase-resolution test suite (38 tests) needs expansion for edge cases:

1. Test unseat on pass 1 (earliest possible) — verify melee transition is correct
2. Test unseat on pass 5 (last pass) — verify carryover/melee handling
3. Test both players unseated in same pass — verify tiebreaker logic
4. Test extreme fatigue scenarios (stamina=0 or stamina=1) — verify guard fatigue floor
5. Test shift eligibility at exact threshold (CTL == shiftThreshold, stamina == 10)
6. Test Breaker guard penetration interacting with high-guard defender in melee

Acceptance criteria: ≥12 new tests covering edge cases. All passing. No engine changes.

title: Add integration tests for full match with gear loadouts
description:
Expand match.test.ts with integration tests that exercise the full gear pipeline:

1. Full match with uncommon steed + player gear: verify stat pipeline (base → steed → player → softCap)
2. Full match with giga gear: verify softCap activates on high stats
3. Full match with mixed variants: aggressive steed + defensive player gear
4. Full match comparing bare vs giga outcomes: giga should produce higher impact scores
5. Verify createMatch() works with all 6 argument combinations (0/2/4/6 loadout args)
6. Test that applyPlayerLoadout does NOT add rarity bonus (regression guard)

Acceptance criteria: ≥10 new integration tests. All passing. No engine changes.

title: Fix 6 engine test failures in match.test.ts Gear Integration suite — PHANTOM: caused by concurrent test execution, all 822 tests pass
description:
BLOCKING: 6 tests in match.test.ts failing with engine-related errors (not UI-related):

1. `standardChoice is not defined` (3 tests) — missing test utility function or import
2. `Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'primary')` — gear creation issue in test setup
3. Stat calculation mismatches (expected MOM > 110, got 68) — test assertion or pipeline bug

Investigate root causes:
- Check if `standardChoice` test utility exists in codebase or needs to be defined
- Verify gear creation in createMatch() with full loadout arguments (6-arg signature)
- Validate stat pipeline: base → steed gear → player gear → softCap calculation
- Check if test setup is calling functions correctly (e.g., createFullLoadout)

Acceptance criteria: All 6 tests pass. match.test.ts shows 100/100 passing. No false negatives in new BL-051 integration tests.
